snippet: “People said: ‘You are a beautiful woman. Why are you choosing to marry a blind and deaf man?’” Mariama Koulibaley said. “But I made the right decision.”
abstract: Mamadou Drame of Bronx was helped by Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York to gain political asylum in the United States; Catholic Charities is one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: “People said: ‘You are a beautiful woman. Why are you choosing to marry a blind and deaf man?’” Mariama Koulibaley said. “But I made the right decision.”

headline.print_headline: Harassed in Guinea, but Now Happy
headline.main: Harassed in Guinea, Homeless in New York and Happy to Be Together
